channel.title: GUI improvement suggestion: scrolling
channel.description: As far as I can see, the only way to scroll left/right in a patch is by using the bottom scrollbar. This requires lots of mouse-movement and point/click/drag activity. On top of that, I have a launch panel popping up when I move the cursor to the bottom of the screen... Wouldn't it be nice to enable the scroll wheel + modifier key (e.g. SHIFT) for left/right scrolling? :smile:
